sentence.Network_en: VaD incidence of intervenient group was lower than that in control group.

sentence.Network_en: This article was involved the hydrophilic lubricious coating applied to the surface of the intervenient catheter.

sentence.Network_en: For reconstructing the publicness, Philosophy of Medicine would be open, critical, academic, intervenient, present and humanistic.
